name: INVICTUS Warriors
description:
INVICTUS Warriors is a video game developped by Thunderblast, a group of first year students in their second semester at EPITA. INVICTUS Warriors is a TPS (Third Person Shooter) arcade video game where the players must escape zombies' attacks in different hostile environments.

MULTIPLAYER:

Play with up to 4 friends together online

GAME MODES:

Two game modes are available at launch:

  • Escape: You will have to find three golden keys in the map in order to open the Exit door and escape from the map. Be aware, zombies will try to kill you ! Equip yourself with the best weapons in Vending Machines or with the Slot Machine.
  • Survival: Here there is no exit ! You will have to survive the biggest amount of waves. Equip yourself with the best weapons in Vending Machines or with the Slot Machine. Also, you can Upgrade your weapons with the Upgrade Table.

OFFLINE:

You will be able to play alone offline. 

MAPS:

Two maps are available at launch:

  • Castle: Go explore the old castle where the pandemic has begun.
  • Forest: Explore a Graveyard with its forest nearby

That's not much but we will keep on adding free updates.

Thunderblast over...
